column4: The desktop CD allows you to try Ubuntu without changing your computer at all <-- will someone please tell me what this means exactly? I'm running windows right now with a ton of data i figured I was going to have to backup / partition before installing linux
ok, do people actually USE that in their everyday life? Or is it more of a DEMO? Can I write files to my existing HDD?
yes they do, though it is really a demo. and you can write to your existing hdd
you just need to mount it
